Load Libraries

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

Load Data
```{r}
morph <- read.csv("~/horsenettle_2022/data/flower_traits.csv", header = TRUE)
fruit <- read.csv("~/horsenettle_2022/data/fruit.csv", header = TRUE)

```

# Creating a figure theme for all plots
```{r}
HStheme <- function(){            
  theme_bw()+                          
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 12), 
        text = element_text(family = "sans"), 
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 12),
        plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 16, vjust = 1, hjust = 0.5),
        axis.title = element_text(size = 14),
        panel.grid = element_blank(),
        plot.margin = unit(c(0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5), units = , "cm"),
        plot.title = element_text(size = 20, vjust = 1, hjust = 0.5),
        legend.text = element_text(size = 12),
        legend.title = element_blank())
}
```



Fruit Set
```{r}

# Calculating fruit set and rounding to 3 digits
fruit$fruit_set <- fruit$fruit_count / fruit$pollinated
fruit$fruit_set <- round(fruit$fruit_set, digits = 3)


# Mixed effects model
fruitSet.m <- lmer(fruit_set ~ Treatment + Region + (1|Population:ID), data = fruit)

(fruitSet.m.a <- anova(fruitSet.m))
(fruitSet.m.r <- ranova(fruitSet.m))




fruit_bar <- fruit
fruit_bar$fruit_set <- as.character(fruit_bar$fruit_set)

(fruit_bar %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  ggplot() + 
    geom_bar(aes(x = fruit_set, fill = Treatment), alpha = 0.8)+ 
    labs(x = "Fruit Set", y = "Count") +
    scale_fill_manual(values = c("#474747", "#FF3030")) + 
    HStheme())

# Saving graph
# ggsave("figures/ovuleNumber.png", width = 7, height = 5, dpi = 300)

```


```{r}

meanMorph <- morph %>% 
  group_by(Iden) %>% 
  summarise_at(vars(c(viable_seed, ovule_number)), list(mean = mean))


morph$seedset <- morph$viable_seed / morph$ovule_number

seedset.m <- lmer(seedset ~ Treatment + Region + (1|Population:ID), data = morph)

(ovule.m.a <- anova(ovule.m))
(ovule.m.r <- ranova(ovule.m))

# Ovule Number
ggplot(morph, aes(x = Treatment, y = ovule_number, fill = Treatment)) +
  geom_boxplot(alpha = 0.8) +
  labs(y = "Ovule Number")+
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#474747", "#FF3030")) +

# Is there phenotypic plasticity
ggplot(morph, aes(x = Treatment, y = ovule_number, color = Region)) +
  HStheme() +
  stat_summary(aes(group = ID), fun = mean, geom = "line", size = 1, alpha = 0.7) +
  stat_summary(aes(color = Region, group = ID), 
               fun.data = mean_cl_boot,
               geom = "errorbar",
               width = 0.1, size = 0.2) +
  stat_summary(aes(color = Region),
               fun = mean, geom = "point") +
  geom_point(aes(color = Region), size = 2) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#104E8B", "#CD2626")) +
  labs(y = "Ovule Number")+
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
